m_szDocTitle: CORRECTION: Tesla Motors (TSLA) Founder Elon Musk's SpaceX Rocket Explodes - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet CORRECTION: Tesla Motors (TSLA) Founder Elon Musk's SpaceX Rocket Explodes By Kurumi Fukushima | 06/29/15 - 08:52 AM EDT NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) --  Earlier this morning, TheStreet reported that Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) is affiliated with SpaceX, when in fact the two are separate unrelated companies, despite both being founded by Elon Musk. An unmanned SpaceX rocket exploded shortly after lift-off on Sunday, according to the AP.  The rocket was carrying more than 5,200 pounds of supplies and other cargo to the International Space Station, when it broke apart two and a half m
